page.title: 08E. GLACKTON (GOLLANFIELD)
page.content: { Easter Glackton}is a very interesting farm.It has the very first milking {carousel}in{Scotland.}This{carousel goes round in a circle as the cows are being milked. First,one door opens and a cow steps in; each cow has a number and in the middle of the{carousel}a man stands and slips the number into a slot to remind him that that cow has been milked. { Mr.Maclennan}has{120 cows}and they give{1800 litres}daily. When the milk is cooled it is put in to tankers and sent away to the{Milk {Marketing Board. The farm was built in{1873}and a new dairy was also built again in{1973. The{cattle court}was burned down and rebuilt in{1981.
